mapper.select: SELECT CT_ID as contractID FROM CONTRACT WHERE CT_DIV = '발주'
SELECT M_ID as matID FROM MATERIAL

SELECT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 AS qsDiv1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(QS_ID) AS MinQS_ID, QS_DF_DIV1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD GROUP BY QS_DF_DIV1 ) grouped_qs ON qs.QS_ID = grouped_qs.MinQS_ID ORDER BY qs.QS_ID ASC
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1}
SELECT CT_ID as contractIDModal FROM CONTRACT WHERE CT_DIV = '발주' AND CT_REAL_QUANTITY IS NULL

SELECT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 AS qsDiv1Modal FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(QS_ID) AS MinQS_ID, QS_DF_DIV1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD GROUP BY QS_DF_DIV1 ) grouped_qs ON qs.QS_ID = grouped_qs.MinQS_ID ORDER BY qs.QS_ID ASC
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2Modal FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1Modal}

SELECT comp.C_NAME AS companyNameModal, ct.CT_QUANTITY AS contractQuantityModal, ct.CT_UNIT AS unitModal, m.M_ID AS matIDModal, m.M_NAME AS matNameModal, m.M_USES AS matUsesModal FROM CONTRACT ct JOIN COMPANY comp ON ct.CT_COMPANY_ID = comp.C_ID JOIN MATERIAL m ON ct.CT_MATERIAL_ID = m.M_ID WHERE ct.CT_ID = #{contractIDModal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUALITY_INSPECTION ( QI_ID, QI_CT_ID, QI_MATERIAL_ID, QI_QS_ID, QI_INSPECTION_QUANTITY, QI_PASSED_QUANTITY, QI_DFT_QUANTITY, QI_DATE, QI_NOTE ) VALUES ( quality_inspection_seq.NEXTVAL, #{contractIDModal}, #{matIDModal}, #{qsDiv1Modal}, #{inspectionQuantityModal}, #{goodQuantityModal}, #{poorQuantityModal}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{notesModal} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CONTRACT SET ct_real_quantity = #{inspectionQuantityModal}, ct_real_IB_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE CT_ID = #{contractIDModal}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO INVENTORY USING DUAL ON (inv_material_id = #{matIDModal}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET inv_quantity = inv_quantity + #{goodQuantityModal} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (inv_material_id, inv_quantity, inv_unit) VALUES (#{matIDModal}, #{goodQuantityModal}, #{unitModal})
